author: Associated Press
title: Transgender boy wins controversial girls state title | Daily Mail Online
text: DON'T MISS 'I had NO idea!' Little Mix's Jade Thirlwall is left red-faced and 'howling' with laughter after fans point out she was wearing her dress back to front all day 'Why is she so miserable?' Fans slam Michelle Keegan's 'dull and dreary' appearance on Ant And Dec's Saturday Night Takeaway as show goes embarrasingly wrong 'Just what I needed': Pregnant Danielle Lloyd shows off her bump during relaxing spa day with fiancé Michael O'Neill... as feud with Jamie O'Hara rages on 'She's thrilled and SO happy': Gary Lineker's ex-wife Danielle Bux 'is expecting her first child with boyfriend Nate Greenwald' A year after they split Someone's in bloom! Pregnant Amal Clooney covers her growing baby bump in floral print minidress as she steps out for romantic dinner date with George 'What do people think goes on?': Michelle Keegan fires back at split rumours as she insists her marriage with Mark Wright is stronger than ever Abbey Clancy oozes glamour in backless black gown as she makes elegant appearance at the Emeralds and Ivy Ball... following her wild night out at the BRITs Nigella Lawson 'enjoys a candlelit date' with an author and film producer who was falsely jailed for the IRA murder of a policeman in the 1970s Jeremy Kyle's ex-wife says their nanny 'morphed' into her during years with the TV host's family by copying clothes, hair-style and even her POSES before stealing her husband Lauren Goodger continues to flaunt her 10lb weight loss in daring pin-flashing mini skirt at beauty launch alongside TOWIE pal Amber Dowding Look out La La Land! Moonlight SWEEPS Independent Spirit Awards by winning SIX gongs including top honor Best Feature... as Oscars loom 'Honey P!' Peter Kay dresses as X Factor rapper Honey G while filling in for Robbie Williams as guest judge on Let It Shine finale He made an entrance LOCK-ing in another business venture! Katie Price takes to Twitter to reveal beauty salon opening... after admitting she relies on wigs and extensions due to hair loss Missing Harry? Meghan Markle seeks comfort in a pal as she is spotted in Toronto afte extended stay at Kensington Palace with Prince Harry Who's who in Meghan's crew: meet the British social set of Prince Harry's girlfriend Who will she be hanging out with if she moves to Kensington Palace Former TOWIE star Frankie Essex flashes her cleavage in thigh-skimming playsuit as she attends salon launch... after losing more than two stone 'We've been through so much': James Arthur confirms he is back with ex Jessica Grist... and gushes she is 'special' after supporting him through glass attack Head judge Jason? Strictly stalwart is tipped to waltz into Len Goodman's ballroom shoes Chief choreographer Jason Gilkison is tipped 'Who is that?': Warren Beatty is teased during opening monologue as Annette Bening receives nod for Best Female Lead at Independent Spirit Awards 'Step back and take a look at your life': Danny Dyer's aunt urges the troubled EastEnders star to get a grip for the sake of his wife and children Lily Allen reveals she's bipolar and tells her Twitter followers she suffered post traumatic stress disorder after her son was stillborn Told Twitter followers Peep show! Ariel Winter puts her cleavage on display in plunging sheer lingerie bustier for a new shoot The 19-year-old left little to the imagination Madonna playfully cuddles her newly adopted twins in heartwarming Instagram snap Said to be called Stella and Esther Five to Five are crowned champions in dazzling Let It Shine finale... as Robbie Williams reunites with Take That for exciting performance Blac Chyna is spotted without her engagement ring while out in Beverly Hills following split from Rob Kardashian Possibly confirming the breakup Wright-fully the centre of attention! TOWIE's Jessica oozes sophistication in figure-flattering flared jumpsuit as she makes a stylish arrival at charity ball Gigi Hadid oozes glamour in faux-fur camouflage coat while sister Bella goes punk rock in graphic tee and PVC trousers as they step out in Milan Tom Jones is the first judge to steal on The Voice as he takes on Victoria Kerley... while winning rival Lia White admitted she 'thought her opponent would win' Ahead of its killer comeback, we reveal all you need to know about the characters, locations and mysteries that will at last be solved as Broadchurch returns for a final series Bell-y of the ball! Pregnant Storm Keating showcases her baby bump in skimming gown alongside husband Ronan as they lead the style at charity ball Girl after his own fart! Charlotte Crosby passes wind in rumoured beau Stephen Bear's FACE in disgusting Snapchat video... after Chloe Ferry engages in SAME antic Everyone's waiting for the wheels to come off: As Top Gear returns, Matt LeBlanc on Chris Evans's departure and what made him decide to stay She's off her trotters! Megan McKenna has the last laugh as she defiantly proves she doesn't have six toes during TOWIE pedicure session Hot mama! Ciara shows off her growing baby bump and long legs in sultry thigh-baring evening gown She looks elegant as ever Tom Hardy for BAFTA for Most Mesmerising Actor of 2017 and Trendiest Goatee in 1814. Voodoo Poldark triumphed in the series finale of Taboo, by JIM SHELLEY TA DA-lia! Storm makes a showstopping appearance as she flashes her impeccably taut abs in skimpy bralet and faux-fur coat for gender equality event Pregnant Amal Clooney dresses her baby bump in chic monochrome suit as she and husband George leave their Paris hotel Academy Award nominee Naomie Harris displays her incredible figure in lacy blue lingerie ahead of potential triumph at the Oscars Just how far will Meghan Markle go for love? 1,200 miles to be exact with the star set to join Harry on an epic trek from California to DC for wounded troops How I faced up to my fear of death and learned to love myself at 50: Breakfast TV star KATE GARRAWAY tries bizarre life hacks including 'throat chakra' to turn back time Kate Beckinsale is effortlessly stunning in figure-hugging black gown adorned with feathers as she arrives at the Independent Spirit Awards in LA Mother loses HALF her body weight for her daughter's wedding because she didn't want to be the 'fat sweaty blob' she felt like on her own big day 'I'm taking a bit of a breather' Actor Tom Hiddleston taking most of 2017 off... months after his public romance with Taylor Swift Well deserved Who needs The Oscars? Kate Beckinsale, Kerry Washington, and Naomie Harris lead glam parade on 2017 Independent Spirit Awards red carpet Slumber party? Charlotte Crosby is seen leaving Stephen Bear's London home the morning after tweeting she 'will be his wife'... despite both denying they are an item 'It was one of the best nights I've ever had': Spandau Ballet's Martin Kemp admits he enjoyed an eight-hour drug spree with Steve Strange in his youth Under wraps! Australian actress Margot Robbie keeps a low-profile under a black hooded cape while filming court scenes for sports biopic I, Tonya in Atlanta Grubs and Bacon! Scarlett Moffatt is forced to relive her jungle days as she chows down on a witchetty grub for a new commercial 'Your hands were always in her handbags': Aaron Chalmers slams Lewis Bloor after he challenges him to box following claims he 'sponged' off Marnie EastEnders actor Adam Woodyatt DENIES clashing with Danny Dyer... after he 'bragged he was the better actor' prior to his break from the soap 'He's getting the best help': TOWIE's James Argent checks into Thai rehab to overcome 'depression' as he cuts off contact with pals to 'seek out help alone' Lottie Moss oozes sex appeal wearing nothing but a tuxedo jacket as she cosies up to Sofia Richie and 'Golden Barbie' Jasmine Sanders in Milan Linda Lusardi's daughter Lucy Kane catches the eye in pink off-the-shoulder top and tiny denim miniskirt ahead of dramatic sing off on The Voice UK Twinning! Naomi Watts, 48, looks radiant and relaxed in denim with friend in matching outfit while shopping in Beverly Hills Perfect pairing Specsy and she knows it! Pixie Lott looks sartorially savvy in fringed white coat and trendy over-sized glasses as she steps out in Milan Nicki Minaj attacked by rapper Remy Ma in 7-minute diss track Shether... as pair's 10-year feud heats up The battle of rap queens continues Still got it! Eva Herzigova, 43, flaunts her age-defying beauty as she upstages Kendall Jenner on the Bottega Veneta runway during Milan Fashion Week Naomi Campbell nails off-duty chic in stylish tweed coat as she steps out during Milan Fashion Week Proved her star status once again GIRL ABOUT TOWN: Double Oscar winner Denzel Washington in talks to play King Lear on the London stage 'I am in the best place of my life!' Paris Hilton chats to handsome male friend... as she opens up about her new single life She's proudly single for the first time in her life. What's wrong Robbie? Williams pulls out of judging Let It Shine with a mystery 'ailment'... but he'll still perform with Take That Snubbed Gary Barlow GIRL ABOUT TOWN: Model Vogue Williams has agreed to star in the next series of The Jump despite ski accident horror Very brave indeed Born that way! Lady Gaga wears her hair long and loose as she heads to early morning yoga class She knows it's the early bird that gets the worm Not so squeaky clean now! TV presenter Alex Jones admits she once took part in a Welsh nationalist protest where eggs were hurled at the QUEEN GIRL ABOUT TOWN: Kelly Brook is flogging her clothes online after her company lost £100,000 last year Nice one! 'Success couldn't fix our insecurity': Gillian Anderson and best friend Jennifer Nadel on why they've written a 'manual for life' Issues that affect us all GIRL ABOUT TOWN: Karl Lagerfeld brands Meryl Streep 'cheap' after 'she demanded to be paid to wear one of his creations to the Oscars Britney Spears' eight-year-old niece Maddie has fully recovered from her life threatening ATV accident She has 'fully recovered' Hello sunshine! Freida Pinto stuns in a yellow gown and 9ct diamond earrings at Independent Spirit Awards She will make a huge impact 'Now, what to wear?' Charlize Theron posts flashback photo as she picks out this year's Oscars gown Flashback photo from Oscars 2016 Keep your enemies closer? PR Queen Roxy Jacenko has reportedly 'rehired' Sara Huegill years after firing publicist for alleged 'dishonest conduct' Elsa Hosk flaunts her model physique in sheer lace ensembles as she storms the Ermanno Scervino runway for Milan Fashion Week A new Fresh Prince! Jaden Smith is dad Will's mini me as he spends a quiet afternoon with friends Kicking back at Zinque Cafe in West Hollywoo The boys are back in town! David Beckham enjoys fun-filled weekend away in Paris with pals to celebrate footballer Phil Neville's 40th birthday It's all about equality! Kendall Jenner struts in futuristic Versace video celebrating the 'power of women' Neon lights, dance music and fierce fashion 'It's all over': Patrick Stewart reveals Logan will be his LAST X-Men movie as Professor Charles Xavier Finally hanging up the Cerebro helmet Mother and daughter night out! Denise Van Outen shows off her tan in a plunging floral dress as she leaves restaurant with Betsy, 6, in Dubai 'This administration is abhorrent': Casey Affleck blasts Trump as 'un-American' during acceptance speech as Independent Spirit Awards gets political Red hot! Molly Shannon in ruffled crimson gown as she's nominated for Best Supporting Female at Independent Spirit Awards Looked stunning A step back in time! Kendall Jenner rocks the Bottega Veneta runway with a retro updo and plunging black dress at Milan Fashion Week show Check her out! Gigi Hadid cuts a colourful figure in a classy coat as she struts her stuff on the Missoni catwalk at Milan Fashion Week 'Starting the day right!' Lea Michele dons a bikini for a yoga pose by a pool on her Maui vacation The actress is enjoying a well-deserved break Pixie takes the plunge! Lott looks sensational in a flesh-flashing cocktail dress as she leaves party with casually dressed model fiance Oliver Cheshire Well suited! Actor Brenton Thwaites looks dapper in tailored grey suit ahead of new Pirates of the Caribbean movie 'The love of my life!' Ben Foster dedicates Best Supporting Male gong to pregnant fiance Laura Prepon at Independent Spirit Awards And the Oscar for best baby picture goes to...! Can you reccognise Hollywood's finest when they were starry-eyed children dreaming of the big time White hot! Kylie Jenner puts on a busty display and shows off her flat abs in boyish white undies Flaunted her idyllic body in coy Instagram selfie Jon Hamm shows off his grey suit as he twirls on the carpet at the Independent Spirit Awards It's usually atresses who show off their attire 'I am unable to attend': Heavily pregnant Natalie Portman to skip Oscars and Independent Spirit Awards She is due to give birth any day 'I make him a priority:' Supermodel Cindy Crawford says putting husband Rande Gerber FIRST is the secret to their 19-year marriage What a phoney! Rita Ora drops BOTH of her mobiles on the floor as she emerges from her car... leaving one of them completely smashed Rosanna Arquette sparkles in sequins and leather as she rocks out at the Independent Spirit Awards Showed up in her usual rockstar chic style Demi Lovato is attacked on Twitter after tweeting results of a DNA test and exclaiming that she is one per cent African Sealed with a kiss! Hugh Jackman smooches wife of 20 years Deborra-Lee Furness ahead of appearance on Good Morning America Not Ben Affleck's best moment! Batman v Superman: Dawn Of Justice is awarded FOUR Razzies... including worst sequel More like c***man! Dancing queen! Chloe Lattanzi busts a move to hip hop as she looks to follow in mum Olivia Newton-John's footsteps with new movie Touchy feely Sam Taylor-Johnson, 49, and husband, Aaron, 26, put on a loved-up display at glitzy Hollywood dinner Looked more in love than ever Avert your eyes! Pamela Anderson, 49, strips NAKED as she shares a steamy moment with a hunky male model during racy photoshoot 'This is so embarrassing!' Ferne McCann is left red-faced after suffering from bowel problems during double date with 'man of her dreams' on Celebs Go Dating She's electric! Freida Pinto dazzles in bright blue gown with cut out panels as she attends star-studded Women In Film pre-Oscar bash Pregnant Amal Clooney outshines husband George as she displays her growing baby bump in sweeping ballgown at the Cesar Film Awards Blooming marvellous Cat Deeley shimmers in a silver mini-dress as she represents the UK at star-studded party honoring British Oscar nominees Thigh's the limit! Christina Milian puts her legs on show in torn micro shorts and matching boots Made sure people could admire her gym results A chip off the old block! Danny Dyer's daughter DANI Dyer tells fan who revealed his sex texts 'If I see you I'll f***ing hurt ya' Taking her talent to new heights! Nicole Scherzinger performs concert mid-air as she flies to New Orleans for the Mardi Gras festival Danny Dyer's family and friends 'fear he could become sex addict' as the EastEnders star takes break from show On an extended break Beauty in black! Nicola Peltz rocks a PVC corset-style top which flashes her cleavage at star-studded Women in Film Pre-Oscar party Is Jessica Mauboy engaged? Pop star reportedly confirms she is 'making wedding plans' with partner of nearly 10 years Themeli Magripilis 'It was great to watch myself': Nicole Kidman's adorable eight-year-old co-star Sunny Pawar reveals Lion is the FIRST movie he's ever watched Kat Graham bares her bra at Gemfields Oscars Cocktail Party celebrating Ruth Negga and Karla Welch Countdown... to her trip around the world! Pilot Carol Vorderman takes to the air in her private plane as she continues to prepare for her aviation adventure Academy Award favorite Emma Stone sparkles in two-piece outfit as she attends GCC dinner hosted by Oscar-winner Colin Firth 'I can't believe it!' Kim Zolciak celebrates Brielle's 20th birthday... before sharing selfies of herself They look more like sisters Lady in red! Kate Beckinsale showcases her slender waist in vibrant scarlet gown at pre-Oscars bash Kicked off Independent Spirit Award Rhian Sugden 'doesn't feel safe' after thugs stole her laptop with her 'private pictures and messages' on it... a year after her Vernon Kay sext scandal reared its head again Stranger Things beauty Natalia Dyer supports rumored beau Charlie Heaton at NYC As You Are premiere Had had her brunette locks neatly styled Oh baby! Nick and Vanessa Lachey celebrate baby Phoenix's first two months with sweet picture 3's the magic number When will Michelle be extradited for being a paedophile? And is Ian Beale pregnant? The week in Walford on EastEnders, by JIM SHELLEY Sealed with a kiss! Hugh Jackman smooches wife of 20 years Deborra-Lee Furness ahead of appearance on Good Morning America 'Luckily this one was just a joke!' Shirtless Shannon Noll dragged off stage by police mid-song weeks after he was charged with assault Pasta la vista! Actor Hugh Jackman bids farewell to strict Wolverine diet and tucks into a HUGE bowl of noodles on Jimmy Fallon 'It was an ordeal I'll carry with me for the rest of my life': James Arthur admits he was left 'disturbed' after brutal glass attack by jealous thug 'The hardest thing': Wiz Khalifa in mourning after his transgender sister Lala dies aged 32 The 29-year-old paid tribute to Doren 'Lala' Thomaz Retro chic! Extra's Renee Bargh shows off tiny waist in a flared jumpsuit as she attends star-studded event in Los Angeles 'There's no bitterness': Louis Tomlinson gushes about his One Direction bandmates as he praises their support for his first solo performance Not quite swan lake! Bella Thorne pirouettes around her house as she performs ballet in skimpy corset She's never shy in showing off on social media a Legs for days! Sharon Stone slips into leather trousers and Hermès belt on Beverly Hills outing Pulled on a pair of black leather trousers Will Tom Hardy's character live happily ever after - with his sister? 10 questions we want answering from the series finale of Taboo, by JIM SHELLEY How Kendall stole Kylie's hairdresser: Celebrity stylist reveals 'feud' between Jenner sisters ... But insists all is fine 'as long as it stays in the family' Lap of luxury! Selena Gomez lists MASSIVE 10,000 sq ft Fort Worth mansion with tennis/basketball court and media room for $3 million Someone's WHEELY happy to be back! Fifty Shades Darker's Bella Heathcote beams as she touches down at Sydney airport despite having to push her own luggage Bad boy Buddy? Jesinta Campbell appears downcast and distant at the airport as hubby Lance Franklin trails timidly behind Susan Carland compares campaign against Yassmin Abdel-Magied to suspected witches being drowned during the Middle Ages Bumping along! Pregnant Ciara stuns in tight black mini-dress while posing with husband Russell Wilson at party celebrating Hidden Figures Breakup hairdo! Australian model Ashley Hart shows off her new haircut marking a month since announcing her separation from soon-to-be ex husband Buck Palmer Family time! Nicky Hilton and husband James Rothschild take their daughter Lily on a stroll around the Big Apple Nothing to hide! Nicki Minaj shows off her body in a harness and camouflage bikini in saucy Instagrams Showcased her figure in an eye-popping outfit. The new red carpet! Jodie Foster and Michael J. Fox lead rally against Trump's immigration ban instead of the traditional pre-Oscars party Jamie O'Hara fuels pregnancy rumours as he tweets about looking for a bigger car... after girlfriend Elizabeth Jayne Tierney hints they'll have a baby 'A complete fabrication': Meryl Streep's stylist strikes back at Karl Lagerfeld's claim she turned down a Chanel Oscars dress because she wouldn't be paid to wear it 'There's no bitterness': Louis Tomlinson gushes about his One Direction bandmates as he praises their support for his first solo performance 'Love trumps hate, courage trumps fear and always-right trumps wrongs': George Clooney bashes Trump at France's César Awards Body of work! Kate Hudson bares extremely toned abs in mustard yellow crop top at ICG Publicists Awards Not afraid of flashing a little flesh Michelle Dockery exudes elegance in silky emerald palazzo pants and a cut-out top as she storms cocktail party in Los Angeles Running to the runway! Bella Hadid shows off her endless legs and incredible abs in crop top and mini skirt during Milan Fashion Week Effortlessly chic! Actress Rachel Griffiths, 48, cuts an elegant figure in faux fur jacket and thick frame glasses as she attends pre-Oscars event Peekaboob! Mandy Moore stuns in black cut-out jumpsuit as she visits The Tonight Show Loked every inch the Hollywood A-lister as she visited Jimmy Fallon Suits you! Actor Luke Hemworth and wife Samantha ooze glamour as they lead stars on the red carpet at pre-Oscars event in Los Angeles Balancing act! Actress Teresa Palmer juggles newborn baby and toddler as she goes makeup-free while dashing through Sydney airport Mama's boy! Kim Kardashian the queen of social media attempts to teach son Saint how to pose for Snapchat filters Certainly feeling snap happy once again Naomi Campbell steals the front row show in ravishing royal blue dress at Versace MFW runway presentation She looked sexy and sensational in blue Make-up free Pixie Geldof displays her unique hipster style as she steps out for indie theatre premiere at Trafalgar Studios Known for laid back style Ex Emmerdale star Leah Bracknell appears frail just four months after revealing she has terminal cancer Appeared on Loose Women O-la la! Mrs Jordan stuns in a chic black suit jacket and figure-hugging trousers as she signs copies of her autobiography for fans in Romford From the bottom of my fart! Chloe Ferry shares video of herself PASSING WIND in the bath... in an attempt to cheer up newly-single Marnie Simpson 'I'm 13 inside!' Chloe Lattanzi calls herself a mama's girl as she shares picture of herself with mother Olivia Newton John Specs on the Beach! Charlotte Dawson wows in figure-hugging jumpsuit as she sports eighties-inspired corkscrew curls and sexy glasses for gig 'It popped clean out!' Spencer Matthews is the latest contestant to injure himself during The Jump as he SCREAMS in agony after dislocating shoulder in rehearsals 'F**k him!': Mama June vows to get 'revenge body' as she tries to find date for ex Sugar Bear's wedding in From Not To Hot premiere 'Body Shaming is never cool': Model Jay Alvarrez hits back at ex Alexis Ren's 'small d***' claims and STRIPS DOWN on Twitter to let fans decide for themselves Married At First Sight's Anthony Manton bemoans lack of SEX with TV 'bride' Nadia amid reports the controversial show has been renewed So nice, she wore it twice! Emily Ratajkowski wears same khaki green jacket she wore in Milan as she steps out in LA She's had a rough week License to thrill! Former Bond girl Monica Bellucci, 53, shows off her age-defying figure in sexy low cut gown as she attends Belgrade film festival Kendall Jenner flashes her toned stomach and figure beneath chunky athletic coat to storm the catwalk beside best pal Gigi Hadid in Versace's MFW show James Corden spoofs boy bands in Thr33way bit featuring Jordan Peele and Nick Kroll The Carpool Karaoke funnyman unveiled his latest comedic creation 'I will be his wife!': Charlotte Crosby claims she will MARRY Stephen Bear in quickly deleted Tweet... as romance rumours continue to swirl Raised in a two-bedroom council flat by a single mother, now Naomie Harris is tipped for a gong at the Oscars Mum had Post Office job Not one to blend in! Scarlett Moffatt is all smiles as she exits ITV studios in trendy camouflage coat... as she's blasted for 'ending her parents' TV career' 'She still loves me': Lewis Bloor hints that he and Marnie Simpson have reconciled as he slams Aaron Chalmers following claims he 'sponged £25k off her' Sam Reece looks hunky for fashion launch in Liverpool... after slamming ex Stephanie Davis by questioning her 'loyalties' after reuniting with Jeremy McConnell Fresh faced beauty! Cara Santana shows off her glowing complexion at pre-Oscar party in Beverly Hills A romantic Weeknd away? Selena Gomez 'jets to the Netherlands to be with her rumoured beau during the European leg of his world tour' 'Don't spray me I'm FAKE': Victoria's Secret beauty Shanina Shaik sports a faux shearling coat emblazoned with suggestive wording as she keeps warm after a workout in California Why do only films about worthy issues (or Tinseltown itself) win Oscars? Most have been deliberately constructed to win, says DAMIAN THOMPSON Slimline Tina Malone flaunts svelte frame in tiger-print jumpsuit at fashion lunch in Liverpool... after dropping a huge NINE dress sizes Derek Hough will not return for new season of Dancing With The Stars as he judges World Of Dance instead 'I struggled with self doubt': Pregnant Cheryl reflects on her battle with self-esteem... as fans speculate whether she could ALREADY have given birth 'I'll never forget you': Imogen Anthony shares racy images of her friend the 'Queen of Myspace' to pay tribute to the 35-year-old following her tragic death Chloe Madeley flaunts her incredible gym-honed figure and sculpted derriere in a silk bra and suspenders for steamy lingerie shoot Mum's the word for Victoria: Jenna Coleman portrays a 'working mother' in Christening scene as second series of ITV's hit royal drama begins filming 'I don't want to be part of those lies': Corrie's Jennie McAlpine slams previous reports of 'wishing' for gastric band surgery and refuses to be airbrushed 'I've tried to move past it': Love Island's Rachel Fenton reveals she's forgiven boyfriend Rykard Jenkins for sleeping with co-star Olivia Buckland She lifts bro! Supergirl's Melissa Benoist muscles up on Vancouver set of The CW hit An ABS-olutely amazing interview! Cindy Crawford's model daughter Kaia Gerber, 15, shows off her athletic abilities answers 20 questions 'You work hard but don't have much talent!' Eamonn Holmes makes constant digs at Ant & Dec on This Morning on the eve of Saturday Night Takeaway's return EXCLUSIVE: 'Things are about to get very exciting!': Sam Faiers 'set to sign a deal with top US TV network so she can expand her career globally' Lauren Pope flaunts her killer abs and ample cleavage in barely-there white lingerie... as provocatively posing in racy swimsuit Another steamy shot Lily-Rose Depp dazzles in waist-cinching sequin mini dress as she arrives ahead of the 42nd Cesar Awards in Paris Commanded attention Looking tasty in the Big Apple! Jesy Nelson quickly goes from drab to fab as she swaps baggy travel attire for ab-baring bralet hours after NYC arrival Charlotte McKinney stuns in sexy blazer suit as she shows off a hint of tummy at the Net-a-Porter pre-Oscars lunch She looked absolutely stunning Emma Watson is the picture of elegance in a stomach-baring jumpsuit as she cosies up to co-star Dan Stevens at Beauty And The Beast photocall Now that's relaxed! Lady Gaga ditches her bra while enjoying domestic downtime with her new guy Christian Carino Quite revealing She's Stella-r! Maxwell showcases her model curves in figure-flaunting mesh dress for Versace AW17 Milan Fashion Week presentation SEBASTIAN SHAKESPEARE: Pippa Middleton plans a bridal BIKINI with her sister Kate's swimwear designer Famously figure-hugging 'It's a glorious day!' Grime star Stormzy is delighted after Adele wishes him 'good luck darling' and posts a picture of his new album on Instagram One cappuccino and a packet of crisps! Sheridan Smith steps out for refreshments as she takes a break between Funny Girl shows in Manchester Look at those abs! Britney Spears shows off impressive yoga skills while performing a handstand Showed her many fans some tricky moves Katherine Heigl's new drama Doubt gets axed by CBS after just TWO EPISODES It had managed to dribble out only two episodes Heating up the beach! Billy Joel's ex Katie Lee bikini shows off her svelte figure in sexy string bikini Her kitchen skills don't get in the way Emotional Renee Zellweger proudly presents an award to her former publicist and close friend, ALS sufferer Nanci Ryder In Beverly Hills on Friday 'When we can't swaddle fast enough!' NRL WAG Phoebe Burgess shares adorable snap of her newborn baby Poppy Alice ` 'We f****d in the gym!' Kendra Wilkinson tweets explicit details about her sex life with husband Hank Have a boy aged seven and a girl who is two Frankie Essex flaunts her weight loss in leopard-print leggings as she works up a sweat during outdoor bootcamp workout Looking great! 'We've got a really, really solid normal life': Nicole Kidman gushes about domestic bliss in Nashville with Keith Urban and daughters Positively gushing Toned tum! Alessandra Ambrosio shows off her supermodel figure in chic sports bra as she heads to a workout Showed off her gym results in capri leggings Malin Akerman flashes cleavage at Kari Feinstein's Pre-Oscar Style Lounge in Los Angeles The Andaz Hotel in Los Angeles played host Catwalk comeback! Behati Prinsloo displays her incredible post-baby body in triumphant return to the runway in a pin-flaunting mini dress during Versace MFW Pregnant Danielle Lloyd flaunts her curves in sizzling Gothic-inspired fashion shoot... after blocking ex Jamie O'Hara from seeing their sons Hand-in-hand! Australian actress Ruby Rose cuts a low key figure in a camouflage coat alongside girlfriend Jessica Origliasso at a pre-Oscars party in Los Angeles Lap of luxury! Selena Gomez lists MASSIVE 10,000 sq ft Fort Worth mansion with tennis/basketball court and media room for $3 million Gun-toting Kimberley Garner looks every inch the screen siren in a skimpy silk negligee as she cosies up to male co-star while filming her Hollywood movie debut Holly Willoughby shares a sweet video of her son Chester, two, playing a game... after leaving BRITs after-party looking VERY bleary-eyed Silver starlet to golden girl! Gigi Hadid flashes her washboard stomach in crop top and metallic suit before a hasty outfit change into a striking orange ensemble 'I don't have time!' Paris Hilton strips off for sizzling shoot as she reveals why she turned her back on reality TV Found fame on The Simple Life Mahershala Ali welcomes his first child ahead of Oscars with wife Amatus and posts sweet Instagram snap of the pair Lionel Richie 'postpones joint All The Hits tour with Mariah Carey as he recovers from knee surgery' Hello, is it knee you're looking for? Khloe Kardashian and new boyfriend Tristan Thompson proudly show off their love (and amazing beach bodies!) on romantic getaway Wowzers! Effortlessly chic!
